column4: hi, I'm new to Ubuntu. Please tell me how to install the VGA drivers. I downloaded from the site.
clarify exactly what you downloaded from what site. for what card.
yes I got that.
my motherboard is asus p5sd2-vm. and I downloaded the driver package given on the asus website. But I don;t know how to install these
Its showing four sub folder in VGA folder listed as FC6, Mandriva2007.1, Redhat4.4, SuSE10.1
what chipset/video card is it using.. thats the Core thing. You dont normally just download 'drivers' you use thepacakge manager to install the proper drivers.
Which folder should I open for VGA
'vga' means nothing the way you are mentioning it.   its what CHIPSET your video is that matters
Chipset: NorthBridge: SIS 672 and Shouth Bridge: SIS 968
go to  System -> admin -> hardware drivers  and see what it shows..
SIS? Egads.. thats not a good sign. :)
I can;t find the admin folder in File system. Where is it placed?
expore  your menus.. its under  SYSTEM in the menus..
You do not have permission to open the content in root folder...
Error something like that.
In the top panel.. see a MENU item called 'System'? it has a Administration sub menu..
I go to hardware Drivers, after searching the drivers its showing the message: " No Proprietary drivers are in use on this system"
yep. SIS cards really suck.  but  are you haveing other real issues? low res? no Desktop?> or what exactly?
Less resolution and less refresh rate. My moniter resolution is 1440*900 but its not displaying
check the forums for that exact chipset/video  - it may need some tweaks/updates.  But every time someone mentions 'sis' its always problematic. The companies linux support is.. not too great.
Its showing the resolution of 1280*1024
Ohk... can you give me the link of the forum please.
I have the drivers. can the drivers for Mandriva will not work on Ubuntu?

in the Mandriva folder, there is a read me file. and there is written" copy the files to the drivers directory. these are having ext sis_drv.la and sis_drv.so Is the copying of the files to the driver folder not work? Please tell
